GE07bhg4c13u:701: atra kriyā-guṇa-sambandhebhyo vilakṣaṇaḥ sarvo 'pi dharmo jāti-rūpa upādhi-rūpo vā jāti-padena saṃgṛhītaḥ |
GE07bhg4c13u:702: yadṛcchā-śabdo 'pi ḍittha-ḍapitthādir yaṃ kaṃcid dharmaṃ svātmānaṃ vā pravṛttiṃ nimittīkṛtya pravartata iti so 'pi jāti-śabdaḥ |
GE07bhg4c13u:704: ākāśa-śabdo 'pi tārkikāṇāṃ śabdāśrayatvādi-rūpaṃ yaṃ kaṃcid dharmaṃ
GE07bhg4c13u:706: sva-mate tu pṛthivyādivad ākāśa-vyaktīnāṃ janyānām anekatvād ākāśatvam api jātir eveti so 'pi jāti-śabdaḥ |
GE07bhg4c13u:713: tatra na sat tan nāsat iti jāti-niṣedhaḥ kriyā-guṇa-sambandhānām api niṣedhopalakṣaṇārthaḥ ekam evādvitīyam iti jāti-niṣedhas tasyā aneka-vyakti-vṛtter ekasminn asambhavāt |
GE07bhg4c13u:718: athāto ādeśo neti neti [BAU 2.3.6] iti ca sarva-niṣedhaḥ
GE07bhg4c13u:719: | tasmād brahma na kenacic chabdenocyata iti yuktam |

GE07bhg4c13u:721: yathā kathaṃcil lakṣaṇayā śabdena pratipādanād ii gṛhāṇa |

GE07bhg4c13u:724: viśvanāthaḥ : evaṃ sādhanair jñeyo jīvātmā paramātmā ca |

GE07bhg4c13u:731: | mat-param aham eva para utkṛṣṭa āśrayo yasya tat |

GE07bhg4c13u:737: uktaiḥ sādhanair yaj jñeyam upalabhyaṃ jīvātmavastu ca tad ahaṃ prakarṣeṇa subodhatayā vakṣyāmi yaj jñātvā jano 'mṛtaṃ mokṣam aśnute labhate |
GE07bhg4c13u:739: nāsty ādir yasya tat jīvasyādy-utpattir nāsty ato 'not 'pi neti nityāsāv ity arthaḥ |

GE07bhg4c13u:743: dāsabhūto harer eva nānyasyaiva kadācana iti smṛteś ca |

GE07bhg4c13u:780: ekam eva nityaṃ vibhu ca sarvam acetanavargam āvṛtya sva-sattayā sphūrtyā cādhyāsikena sambandhena vyāpya tiṣṭhati nirvikāram
GE07bhg4c13u:781: eva sthitiṃ labhate, na tu svādhyastasya jaḍa-prapañcasya doṣeṇa guṇena vāṇu-mātreṇāpi sambadhyata ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c13u:782: yathā ca sarveṣu deheṣv ekam eva cetanaṃ nityaṃ vibhu ca na pratidehaṃ bhinnaṃ tathā prapañcitaṃ

GE07bhg4c13u:797: rūpādy-ākārāsu vṛttiṣu tat-tad-ākāreṇa bhāsate iti tathā |

GE07bhg4c13u:800: tathā ca śrutiḥ -- apāṇi-pādo javano grahītā paśyaty acakṣuḥ sa śṛṇoty akarṇaḥ ity ādiḥ
GE07bhg4c13u:806: madhusūdanaḥ : adhyāropāpavādābhyāṃ niṣprapañcaṃ prapañcyate iti nyāyam anusṛtya sarva-prapañcādhyāropeṇānādi-mat paraṃ brahmeti vyākhyātam adhunā
GE07bhg4c13u:807: tad-apavādena na sat tan nāsad ucyate iti vyākhyātum ārabhate nirupādhi-svarūpa-jñānāya sarvendriyeti |
GE07bhg4c13u:809: sarveṣāṃ bahiṣkaraṇānāṃ śrotrādīnām antaḥkaraṇayoś ca buddhi-manasor
GE07bhg4c13u:811: tat-tad-viṣaya-rūpatayāvabhāsata iva sarvendriya-vyāpārair vyāpṛtam iva taj jñeyaṃ brahma dhyāyatīva lelāyatīva [BAU 4.3.7] iti śruteḥ |
GE07bhg4c13u:814: tathā paramārthato 'saktaṃ sarva-sambandha-śūnyam eva, māyayā sarva-bhṛc
GE07bhg4c13u:815: ca sadātmanā sarvaṃ kalpitaṃ dhārayatīva poṣayatīti ca sarva-bhṛt,
GE07bhg4c13u:819: guṇa-bhoktṛ ca guṇānāṃ sattva-rajas-tamasāṃ śabdādi-dvārā sukha-duḥkha-mohākāreṇa pariṇatānāṃ bhoktṛ upalabdhṛ ca taj jñeyaṃ brahmety arthaḥ ||14||
GE07bhg4c13u:820: viśvanāthaḥ : kiṃ ca sarvāṇi indriyāṇi guṇān indriya-viṣayāṃś ca ābhāsayatīti tac cakṣuṣaś cakṣuḥ ity ādi śruteḥ |

GE07bhg4c13u:835: apāṇi-pādo javano grahītā paśyaty acakṣuḥ sa śṛṇoty akarṇaḥ |

GE07bhg4c13u:841: tat-sparśa-rahitaṃ nirguṇaṃ sākṣī cetāḥ kevalo nirguṇaś ca iti śruter māyā-guṇa-spṛṣṭam eva sad-guṇa-bhoktṛ-niyamyatayā
GE07bhg4c13u:843: ekas tu pibate devaḥ svacchando 'tra vaśānugām |

GE07bhg4c13u:846: bahir antaś ca bhūtānām acaraṃ caram eva ca |

GE07bhg4c13u:849: bhūtānāṃ carācarāṇāṃ svakāryāṇāṃ bahiś cāntaś ca tad eva suvarṇam iva kaṭaka-kuntalādīnām

GE07bhg4c13u:859: viduṣāṃ punaḥ pratyag-ātmatvād antike ca tan nityaṃ sannihitam |

GE07bhg4c13u:866: madhusūdanaḥ : bhūtānāṃ bhavana-dharmāṇāṃ sarveṣāṃ kāryāṇāṃ kalpitānām
GE07bhg4c13u:867: akalpitam adhiṣṭhānam ekam eva bahir antaś ca rajjur iva sva-kalpitānāṃ
GE07bhg4c13u:869: ata evācaraṃ sthāvaraṃ caraṃ ca jañgamaṃ bhūta-jātaṃ tad evādhiṣṭhānātmakatvāt |
GE07bhg4c13u:870: kalpitānāṃ na tataḥ kiṃcid vyatiricyata ity arthaḥ |

GE07bhg4c13u:880_1: dūrāt sudūre tad ihāntike ca paśyatsv ihaiva nihitaṃ guhāyām [MuṇḍU 3.1.7] ity ādi
GE07bhg4c13u:882: bhūtānāṃ cij-jaḍātmakānāṃ tattvānāṃ bahir antaś ca sthitam |

GE07bhg4c13u:890: bhakti-bhāvitena karaṇena tu śakyaṃ taj jñātum ity āha antike ca tad iti |
GE07bhg4c13u:897: avibhaktaṃ ca bhūteṣu vibhaktam iva ca sthitam |

GE07bhg4c13u:901: avibhaktaṃ kāraṇātmanābhinnaṃ kāryātmanā vibhaktaṃ bhinnam ivāvasthitaṃ ca samudrāj jātaṃ phenādi samudrād anyan na bhavati |

GE07bhg4c13u:904: madhusūdanaḥ : yad uktam ekam eva sarvam āvṛtya tiṣṭhatīti tad vivṛṇoti
GE07bhg4c13u:907: sarva-prāṇiṣu avibhaktam abhinnam ekam eva tat |
GE07bhg4c13u:908: na tu pratidehaṃ bhinnaṃ vyomavat sarva-vyāpakatvāt |
GE07bhg4c13u:909: tathāpi deha-tādātmyena pratīyamānatvāt pratidehaṃ vibhaktam iva ca sthitam |
GE07bhg4c13u:910: aupādikatvenāpāramārthiko vyomnīva tatra bhedāvabhāsa ity arthaḥ |

GE07bhg4c13u:912: nety āha bhūta-bhartṛ ca bhūtāni sarvāṇi sthiti-kāle
GE07bhg4c13u:913: bibhartīti tathā pralaya-kāle grasiṣṇu grasana-śīlam utpatti-kāle
GE07bhg4c13u:917: tasmād yaj jagataḥ sthiti-layotpatti-kāraṇaṃ brahma tad eva kṣetrajñaṃ pratideham ekaṃ jñeyaṃ na tato 'nyad ity arthaḥ ||16||

GE07bhg4c13u:929: tac ca bhūta-bhartṛ-sthitau bhūtānāṃ pālakaṃ pralaye teṣāṃ grasiṣṇu kāla-śaktyā saṃhārakaṃ, sarge prabhaviṣṇu pradhāna-jīva-śaktibhyāṃ
GE07bhg4c13u:931: śrutiś ca yato vā imāni bhūtāni jāyante yena jātāni jīvanti yat prayanty abhisaṃviśanti tad brahma tad vijijñāsasva [TaittU 3.1.1] iti ||16||
GE07bhg4c13u:933: jyotiṣām api taj jyotis tamasaḥ param ucyate |
GE07bhg4c13u:934: jñānaṃ jñeyaṃ jñāna-gamyaṃ hṛdi sarvasya viṣṭhitam ||17||
GE07bhg4c13u:936: jyotiṣāṃ sūryādīnām api jyotiḥ prakāśakaṃ tat |

GE07bhg4c13u:940: tad eva bhāntam anubhāti sarvaṃ tasya bhāsā sarvam idaṃ vibhāti || [KaṭhU 2.5.15] ity ādi-śruteḥ
GE07bhg4c13u:943: jñānaṃ ca tad eva buddhi-vṛttau abhivyaktam |
GE07bhg4c13u:944: tad eva rūpādy-ākāreṇa jñeyaṃ ca jñāna-gamyaṃ ca |
GE07bhg4c13u:947: jñāna-gamyaṃ viśinaṣṭi sarvasya prāṇimātrasya hṛdi viṣṭhitaṃ viśeṣeṇāpracyuta-svarūpeṇa

GE07bhg4c13u:950: madhusūdanaḥ : nanu sarvatra vidyamānam api tan nopalabhyate cet tarhi jaḍam eva syāt, na syāt svayaṃjyotiṣo 'pi tasya
GE07bhg4c13u:952: taj jñeyaṃ brahma jyotiṣām avabhāsakānām ādityādīnāṃ buddhy-ādīnāṃ ca bāhyānām āntarāṇām api jyotir avabhāsakaṃ caityanya-jyotiṣo
GE07bhg4c13u:955: tasya bhāsā sarvam idaṃ vibhāti [KaṭhU 2.5.15] ity ādi-śruteś ca |
GE07bhg4c13u:956: vakṣyati ca yad āditya-gataṃ tejaḥ [Gītā 15.8] ity ādi |
GE07bhg4c13u:957_0: svayaṃ jaḍatvābhāve 'pi jaḍa-saṃsṛṣṭaṃ syād iti nety āha tamaso jaḍa-vargāt param
GE07bhg4c13u:957_1: avidyā-tat-kāryābhyām apāramārthikābhyām asaṃspṛṣṭaṃ pāramārthikaṃ tad brahma sad-asatoḥ
GE07bhg4c13u:958: ucyate akṣarāt parataḥ paraḥ ity ādi-śrutibhir brahma-vādibhiś ca |
GE07bhg4c13u:962: āditya-varṇaṃ tamasaḥ parastāt iti śruteś ca |
GE07bhg4c13u:965: yasmāt tat svayaṃ jyotir jaḍāsaṃspṛṣṭam ata eva taj jñānaṃ
GE07bhg4c13u:967: ata eva tad eva jñeyaṃ jātum arham ajñātatvāj jaḍasyājñātatvābhāvena jñātum anarhatvāt |
GE07bhg4c13u:968: kathaṃ tarhi sarvair na jñāyate tatrāha jñāna-gamyaṃ pūrvoktenāmānitvādinā
GE07bhg4c13u:970: jñāna-śabditena gamyaṃ prāpyaṃ na tu tad vinety arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c13u:971: nanu sādhanena gamyaṃ cet tat kiṃ deśāntara-vyavahitam ? nety āha hṛdi
GE07bhg4c13u:972: sarvasya viṣṭhitaṃ sarvasya prāṇi-jātasya hṛdi buddhau viṣṭhitaṃ sarvatra sāmānyena sthitam api viśeṣa-rūpeṇa tatra sthitam abhivyaktaṃ
GE07bhg4c13u:975: avyavahitam eva vastuto bhrāntyā vyavahitam iva
GE07bhg4c13u:977: viśvanāthaḥ : jyotiṣāṃ candrādityānām api taj jyotiḥ prakāśakaṃ |
GE07bhg4c13u:979: na tatra sūryo bhāti na candra-tārakaṃ
GE07bhg4c13u:981: tad eva bhāntam anubhāti sarvaṃ tasya bhāsā sarvam idaṃ vibhāti || [KaṭhU 2.5.15] ity ādi-śruteḥ
GE07bhg4c13u:982: ata eva tamaso 'jñānāt paraṃ tenāsaṃsṛṣṭam ucyate |
GE07bhg4c13u:984: jñānaṃ tad eva buddhi-vṛttau abhivyaktaṃ sat jñānam ucyate |
GE07bhg4c13u:985: tad eva rūpādy-ākāreṇa pariṇataṃ jñeyaṃ ca |
GE07bhg4c13u:986: tad eva jñāna-gamyaṃ pūrvoktenāmānitvādi-jñāna-sādhanena prāpyam ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c13u:987: tad eva paramātma-svarūpaṃ sat sarvasya prāṇimātrasya hṛdi dhiṣṭhitaṃ niyantṛtayādhbiṣṭhāya sthitam ity arthaḥ ||17||
GE07bhg4c13u:988: baladevaḥ : jyotiṣāṃ sūrydīnām api tad brahma jyotiḥ prakāśakaṃ |
GE07bhg4c13u:989: na tatra sūryo bhāti na candra-tārakaṃ
GE07bhg4c13u:991: tad eva bhāntam anubhāti sarvaṃ tasya bhāsā sarvam idaṃ vibhāti || [KaṭhU 2.5.15]
GE07bhg4c13u:993: tad brahma tamasaḥ prakṛteḥ paraṃ tenāspṛṣṭam ucyate āditya-varṇaṃ tamasaḥ parastāt [ŚvetU 3.8] ity śrutyā |
GE07bhg4c13u:995: cid-eka-rasam ucyate vijñānam ānanda-ghanaṃ brahma [GTU 2.79?] iti śrutyā |
GE07bhg4c13u:996: jñānaṃ mumukṣoḥ śaraṇatvena jñātum arham ucyate taṃ ha devam
GE07bhg4c13u:997: ātma-buddhi-prakāśaṃ mumukṣur vai śaraṇam ahaṃ prapadye [GTU 1.25] iti śrutyā |
GE07bhg4c13u:998: jñāna-gamyam ucyate tam eva viditvātimṛtyum eti [ŚvetU 3.8] iti śrutyā |
GE07bhg4c13u:1000: sthitam ity ucyate antaḥ-praviṣṭaḥ śāstā janānām [TaittĀ 3.11.10] iti śrutyā |
GE07bhg4c13u:1001: na ca sarvataḥ pāṇīty ādi pañcakaṃ jīva-paratayaiva neyaṃ
GE07bhg4c13u:1003: sarvataḥ pāṇīty ādi-sārdhakasya brahmaivopakramya śvetāśvataraiḥ paṭhitvāt
GE07bhg4c13u:1006: iti kṣetraṃ tathā jñānaṃ jñeyaṃ coktaṃ samāsataḥ |
GE07bhg4c13u:1008: śrīdharaḥ : uktaṃ kṣetrādikam adhikāri-phala-sahitam upasaṃharati itīti |
GE07bhg4c13u:1011: jñeyaṃ cānādimat paraṃ brahmety ādi viṣṭhitam ity antam |
GE07bhg4c13u:1012: vasiṣṭhādibhir vistareṇoktaṃ sarvam api mayā saṅkṣepeṇoktam |
GE07bhg4c13u:1016: madhusūdanaḥ : uktaṃ kṣetrādikam adhikāriṇaṃ phalaṃ ca vadann upasaṃharati itīti |
GE07bhg4c13u:1017: iti anena pūrvoktena prakāreṇa kṣetraṃ mahā-bhūtādi-dhṛty-antaṃ,
GE07bhg4c13u:1018_0: tathā jñānam amānitvādi tattva-jñānārtha-darśana-paryantaṃ, jñeyaṃ cānādimat paraṃ
GE07bhg4c13u:1018_1: brahma viṣṭhitam ity antaṃ śrutibhyaḥ smṛtibhyaś cākṛṣya trayam api manda-buddhy-anugrahāya
GE07bhg4c13u:1019: etāvān eva hi sarvo vedārtho gītārthaś ca |
GE07bhg4c13u:1021: evādhikārīty āha -- mad-bhakto mayi bhagavati vāsudeve parama-gurau
GE07bhg4c13u:1022: samarpita-sarvātma-bhāvo mad-eka-śaraṇaḥ sa etad yathoktaṃ kṣetraṃ jñānaṃ ca jñeyaṃ ca vijñāya vivekena viditvā mad-bhāvāya
GE07bhg4c13u:1025: yasya deve parā bhaktiḥ yathā deve tathā gurau |
GE07bhg4c13u:1026: tasyaite kathitā hy arthāḥ prakāśante mahātmanaḥ || [ŚvetU 6.23] iti śruteḥ |
GE07bhg4c13u:1027: tasmāt sarvadā mad-eka-śaraṇaḥ sann ātma-jñāna-sādhanāny eva
GE07bhg4c13u:1029: viśvanāthaḥ : uktaṃ kṣetrādikam adhikāri-phala-sahitam upasaṃharati itīti |
GE07bhg4c13u:1033: jñeyaṃ jñāna-gamyaṃ ca anādīty ādi dhiṣṭhitam ity antam |
GE07bhg4c13u:1037: yad vā mad-bhakto mamaikāntiko dāsa etad
GE07bhg4c13u:1038: vijñāya mat-prabhor etāvad aiśvaryam iti jñātvā mayi bhāvāya premṇa upapadyata upapanno bhavati
GE07bhg4c13u:1039: baladevaḥ : uktaṃ kṣetrādikaṃ taj-jñāna-phala-sahitam upasaṃharati iti kṣetram iti |
GE07bhg4c13u:1040: mahā-bhūtāni ity ādinā cetanā dhṛtir ity antena
GE07bhg4c13u:1042: amānitvam ity ādinā tattva-jñānārtha-darśanam ity antena jñeyasya kṣetra-dvayasya jñānaṃ tat-sādhanam uktam |
GE07bhg4c13u:1044: mat-param ity ādinā hṛdi sarvasya viṣṭhitam ity antena jñeyaṃ kṣetrajña-dvayaṃ coktaṃ mayā
GE07bhg4c13u:1045: etat trayaṃ vijñāya mitho vivekenāvagatya mad-bhāvāya mat-premṇe mat-svabhāvāya vāsaṃsāritvāya kalpate yogye bhavati
GE07bhg4c13u:1048: prakṛtiṃ puruṣaṃ caiva viddhy anādī ubhāv api |
GE07bhg4c13u:1049: vikārāṃś ca guṇāṃś caiva viddhi prakṛti-saṃbhavān ||19||
GE07bhg4c13u:1050: śrīdharaḥ : tad evaṃ tat kṣetraṃ yac ca yādṛk cety etāvat prapañcitam |
GE07bhg4c13u:1051: idānīṃ tu yad vikāri yataś ca yat sa ca yo yat-prabhāvaś cety etat pūrvaṃ
GE07bhg4c13u:1052: pratijñātam eva prakṛti-puruṣayoḥ saṃsāra-hetukatva-kathanena prapañcayati prakṛtim iti pañcabhiḥ
GE07bhg4c13u:1059: atra ca parameśvarasya tac-chaktīnām anāditvaṃ nityatvaṃ ca śrīmac-chaṅkara-bhagavad-bhāṣya-kṛdbhir
GE07bhg4c13u:1061: vikārāṃś ca dehendriyādīn guṇāṃś ca guṇa-pariṇāmān sukha-duḥkha-mohādīn
GE07bhg4c13u:1063: madhusūdanaḥ : tad anena granthena tat kṣetraṃ yac ca yādṛk ca ity etad vyākhyātam |
GE07bhg4c13u:1064: idānīṃ yad-vikāri yataś ca yat sa ca yo yat-prabhāvaś ca ity etāvad vyākhyātavyam |
GE07bhg4c13u:1066: yad-vikāri yataś ca yad iti prakṛtim ity ādi dvābhyāṃ prapañcyate |
GE07bhg4c13u:1067: sa ca yo yat prabhāvaś ca iti tu puruṣa ity ādi dvyābhyām iti vivekaḥ |
GE07bhg4c13u:1068: tatra saptama īśvarasya dve prakṛtī parāpare kṣetra-kṣetrajña-lakṣaṇe upanyasya
GE07bhg4c13u:1070: tatrāparā prakṛtiḥ kṣetra-lakṣaṇā parā tu jīva-lakṣaṇeti tayor anāditvam uktvā
GE07bhg4c13u:1072: prakṛtir māyākhyā triguṇātmikā pārameśvarī śaktiḥ kṣetra-lakṣaṇā yā prāg aparā prakṛtir ity uktā |
GE07bhg4c13u:1073: yā tu parā prakṛtir jīvākhyā prāg uktā sa iha puruṣa ity ukta iti na pūrvāpara-virodhaḥ |
GE07bhg4c13u:1074: prakṛtiṃ puruṣaṃ cobhāv api anādī eva viddhi |
GE07bhg4c13u:1075: na vidyate ādiḥ kāraṇaṃ yayos tau |
GE07bhg4c13u:1083: yataḥ prakṛtir anādir atas tasyā bhūta-yonitvam uktaṃ prāg upapadyata ity āha vikārāṃś ca ṣoḍaśa pañca
GE07bhg4c13u:1084: mahā-bhūtāny ekādaśendriyāṇi ca guṇāṃś ca sattva-rajas-tamo-rūpān
GE07bhg4c13u:1085: sukha-duḥkha-mohān prakṛti-saṃbhavān eva prakṛti-kāraṇakān eva viddhi jānīhi ||19||
GE07bhg4c13u:1086: viśvanāthaḥ : paramātmānam uktvā kṣetra-jña-śabda-vācyaṃ jīvātmānaṃ vaktuṃ kutas tasya māyā-saṃsleṣaḥ, kadā tad-ārambho 'bhūd ity apekṣāyām āha
GE07bhg4c13u:1087: prakṛtiṃ māyāṃ puruṣaṃ jīvaṃ cobhāv apy anādī na vidyate ādi kāraṇaṃ yayos tathābhūtau viddhi anāder īśvarasya mama śaktitvāt |
GE07bhg4c13u:1088: bhūmir āpo 'nalo vāyuḥ khaṃ mano buddhir eva ca |
GE07bhg4c13u:1089: ahaṅkāra itīyaṃ me bhinnā prakṛtir aṣṭadhā ||
GE07bhg4c13u:1090: apareyam itas tv anyāṃ prakṛtiṃ viddhi me parām |
GE07bhg4c13u:1092: iti mad-ukter māyā-jīvayor api mac-chaktitvena anāditvāt tayoḥ saṃśleṣo
GE07bhg4c13u:1094: tatra mithaḥ saṃśliṣṭayor api tayor vastutaḥ pārthakyam asti eva ity āha vikārāṃś ca dehendriyādīn guṇāṃś ca
GE07bhg4c13u:1096: prakṛty-udbhūtān viddhīti kṣetrākāra-pariṇatāyāḥ prakṛteḥ sakāśād bhinnam
GE07bhg4c13u:1098: baladevaḥ : evaṃ mitho vivikta-svabhāvayor anādyoḥ prakṛti-jīvayoḥ
GE07bhg4c13u:1100: tat-saṃsargasyānādi-kālikasya hetuś ca nirūpyate prakṛtim ity ādibhiḥ |
GE07bhg4c13u:1102: mithaḥ sampṛktau prakṛti-puruṣāv ubhāv anādyeva viddhi
GE07bhg4c13u:1104: tayor mac-chaktitvaṃ tu puraivoktaṃ bhūmir āpaḥ ity ādinā |
GE07bhg4c13u:1108: prākṛtān na tu jaivān viddhīti kṣetrātmanā pariṇatāyāḥ prakṛter anyo jīva iti darśitam ||19||
GE07bhg4c13u:1112: śrīdharaḥ : vikārāṇāṃ prakṛti-sambhavatvaṃ darśayan puruṣasya saṃsāra-hetutvaṃ darśayati kāryeti |
GE07bhg4c13u:1120: ayaṃ bhāvaḥ yadyapi acetanāyāḥ prakṛteḥ svataḥ-kartṛtvaṃ na sambhavati tathā puruṣasyāpy avikāriṇo bhoktṛtvaṃ na sambhavati |
GE07bhg4c13u:1124: caitanyādhiṣṭhitatvāt sambhavati yathā vahner ūrdhva-jvalanaṃ vayos tiryag gamanaṃ vatsādṛṣṭa-vaśāt gostanya-payasaḥ kṣaraṇam ity ādi |
GE07bhg4c13u:1126: puruṣa-sannidhānāt prakṛteḥ kartṛtvam ucyate bhoktṛtvaṃ ca sukha-duḥkha-saṃvedanaṃ, tac ca cetana-dharma eveti prakṛti-sannidhānāt
GE07bhg4c13u:1128: madhusūdanaḥ : vikārāṇāṃ prakṛti-sambhavattvaṃ vivecayan puruṣasya saṃsāra-hetutvaṃ darśayati kāryeti |
GE07bhg4c13u:1130: tat-sthāni trayodaśa dehārambhakāṇi bhūtāni viṣayāś ceha kārya-grahaṇena
GE07bhg4c13u:1135: tad-ākāra-pariṇāme hetuḥ kāraṇam prakṛtir ucyate maharṣibhiḥ |
GE07bhg4c13u:1137: evaṃ prakṛteḥ saṃsāra-kāraṇatvaṃ vyākhyāya puruṣasyāpi yādṛśaṃ tat tad āha puruṣo kṣetrajñaḥ parā prakṛtir iti prāg vyākhyātaḥ |
GE07bhg4c13u:1145: kartāra indriyādhiṣṭhātāro devās tatra tathādhyāsena puruṣa-saṃsargāt kāryādi-rūpeṇa pariṇatā syād avidyākhyayā
GE07bhg4c13u:1146: sva-vṛttyā tad-adhyāsa-pradā ca syād ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c13u:1150: kāryatva-kāraṇatva-kartṛtva-bhoktṛtvāni prakṛti-dharmā eva syus tad api kāryatvādiṣu jaḍāṃśa-prādhānyāt, sukha-duḥkha-saṃvedana-rūpe bhoge tu caitanyāṃśa-prādhānyāt |
GE07bhg4c13u:1151: prādhānyena vyapadeśā bhavantīti nyāyāt kāryatvādiṣu prakṛtir hetuḥ |
GE07bhg4c13u:1152: bhoktṛtve puruṣo hetur ity ucyate iti ||20||
GE07bhg4c13u:1153: baladevaḥ : atha saṃsṛṣṭayos tayoḥ kārya-bhedam āha kāryeti śarīraṃ kāryaṃ
GE07bhg4c13u:1156: puruṣaḥ prakṛtistho hi ity agrimāt sva-saṃsargeṇa sacetanāṃ prakṛtiṃ puruṣo 'dhitiṣṭhati |
GE07bhg4c13u:1157: tad-adhiṣṭhitā tu sā tat-karmāṇu-guṇyena pariṇamamānā tat-tad-dehādīnāṃ
GE07bhg4c13u:1158: sraṣṭrīti prakṛtyārpitānāṃ sukhādīnāṃ bhoktṛtve puruṣo hetus teṣāṃ bhoge sa eva kartey arthaḥ
GE07bhg4c13u:1160: tac ca śarīrādi-kartṛtvaṃ tu tad-adhiṣṭhātāyāḥ prakṛter iti puruṣasyaiva kartṛtvaṃ mukhyam
GE07bhg4c13u:1161: evam āha sūtrakāraḥ kartā śāstrārthavattvāt ity ādibhiḥ |
GE07bhg4c13u:1162: pareśasya harer adhiṣṭhātṛtvaṃ tu sarvatrāvarjanīyam ity uktaṃ vakṣyate ca ||20||
GE07bhg4c13u:1164: puruṣaḥ prakṛti-stho hi bhuṅkte prakṛtijān guṇān |
GE07bhg4c13u:1166: śrīdharaḥ : tathāpy avikāriṇo janma-rahitasya ca bhoktṛtvaṃ katham iti |
GE07bhg4c13u:1169: prakṛti-sthas tat-kārye dehe tādātmyena sthitaḥ puruṣaḥ |
GE07bhg4c13u:1171: asya ca puruṣasya satīṣu devādi-yoniṣu asatīṣu tiryag-ādi-yoniṣu yāni janmāni teṣu
GE07bhg4c13u:1172: guṇa-saṅgo guṇaiḥ śubhāśubha-karma-kāribhir indriyaiḥ saṅgaḥ kāraṇam ity arthaḥ ||21||
GE07bhg4c13u:1174: prakṛti-stho hy eva puruṣo bhuṅkte upalabhate prakṛti-jān guṇān |
GE07bhg4c13u:1176: prakṛti-ja-guṇopalambha-hetuṣu sad-asad-yoni-janmasu sad-yonayo devādyās teṣu hi sāttvikam iṣataṃ phalaṃ bhujyate |
GE07bhg4c13u:1177: asad-yonayaḥ paśv-ādyās teṣu hi tāmasam aniṣṭaṃ phalaṃ bhujyate |
GE07bhg4c13u:1180: na tv asaṅgasya tasya svataḥ saṃsāra ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c13u:1181: athavā guṇa-saṅgo guṇeṣu śabdādiṣu sukha-duḥkha-mohātmakeṣu saṅgo 'bhilāṣaḥ kāma iti yāvat
GE07bhg4c13u:1182: sa evāsya sad-asad-yoni-janmasu kāraṇam sa yathā-kāmo bhavati tat kratur
GE07bhg4c13u:1183: bhavati yat kratur bhavati tat karma kurute yat karma kurute tad abhisampadyate [BAU 4.4.5] iti śruteḥ |
GE07bhg4c13u:1187: karṭrva-bhoktṛtvādikaṃ tadīyam api dharmaṃ svīyaṃ manyate |
GE07bhg4c13u:1188: tata evāsya saṃsāra ity āha puruṣa iti |
GE07bhg4c13u:1190: prakṛtijān antaḥkaraṇa-dharmān śoka-moha-sukha-duḥkhādīn guṇān svīyān eva abhimanyamāno bhuṅkte
GE07bhg4c13u:1193: kva bhuṅkte ity apekṣāyām āha satīṣu devādi-yoniṣu asatīṣu tiryag-ādi-yoniṣu
GE07bhg4c13u:1195: baladevaḥ : prakṛty-adhiṣṭhāne sikhādibhoge ca puruṣasyaiva kartṛtvam ity etat sphuṭayati tasya prakṛti-saṃsarge hetuṃ ca darśayati puruṣa iti |
GE07bhg4c13u:1196_1: prāna-viśiṣṭaḥ sann eva tat-kṛtān guṇān sukhādīn bhuṅkte 'nubhavati kvety āha sad
GE07bhg4c13u:1198: asatīṣu paśu-pakṣy-ādiṣu ca sādhv-asādhu-racitāsu yoniṣu yāni janmādīni
GE07bhg4c13u:1199: teṣv iti tatra tatra puruṣasyaiva kartṛtvam |
GE07bhg4c13u:1205: sa ca bhoktṛtvād bhogyān viṣayān spṛhayaṃs
GE07bhg4c13u:1208: tat-kṣaye tu parātma-dhāma-sukhāni bhuṅkte so 'śnute sarvān kāmān saha brahmaṇā vipaścitā ity ādi śrutibhya iti |
GE07bhg4c13u:1209: yat tu prakṛter ity ādeḥ kārya-kāraṇety ādeḥ prakṛtyaiva cety āder nānyaṃ guṇebhyaḥ ity ādeś cāpātatārtha-grāhibhiḥ sāṅkhyaiḥ prakṛter eva kartṛtvam
GE07bhg4c13u:1210: uktaṃ, tat kila rabhasābhidhānam eva loṣṭra-kāṣṭhavad acetanāyās tasyās tattva-sambhāvāt
GE07bhg4c13u:1211: upādānāparokṣa-cikīrṣākṛtimattvaṃ khalu kartṛtvaṃ, tac ca cetanasyaiveti śrutir āha - vijñānaṃ yajñaṃ tanute karmāṇi tanute 'pi
GE07bhg4c13u:1213: eṣa hi draṣṭā spraṣṭā śrotā rasayitā ghrātā mantā boddhā kartā nijñānātmā puruṣaḥ ity ādikam
GE07bhg4c13u:1214: yac ca puruṣa-sannidhānāc caitanyādhyāsāt tasyās tattvam ity āhus tan na |
GE07bhg4c13u:1215: yat sannidhyadhasta-caitanyāt tasyāḥ kartṛtvaṃ tat tasyaiva sannihitasyeti suvacatvāt |
GE07bhg4c13u:1216: na khalu tapāyaso dagdhṛtvam ayo-hetukam api tu vahni-hetukam
GE07bhg4c13u:1218: na ca calati jalaṃ phalati tarur itivaj jaḍāyās tasyās
GE07bhg4c13u:1222: svargādi-phalakaṃ jyotiṣṭomādi-mokṣa-phalakaṃ dhyānaṃ ca smṛtir vidhatte
GE07bhg4c13u:1223: 'pi tu cetanam eva bhoktāram uddiśyeti puruṣasyaiva kartṛtvam |
GE07bhg4c13u:1224: tac ca prakṛter iti yad uktaṃ tat tu tad-vṛtti-prācuryād eva yathā kareṇa
GE07bhg4c13u:1225: bibhrati puruṣe karo bibhartīti vyapadeśas tathā prakṛtyā kurvati puruṣe prakṛtiḥ karotīti sa bhaved ity eke, prākṛtair dehādibhir yuktasyaiva
GE07bhg4c13u:1226: puruṣasya yajña-yuddhādi-karma-kartṛtvaṃ, na tu tair viyuktasya śuddhasyety ataḥ prakṛtes tad ity apare ||21|
GE07bhg4c13u:1229: paramātmeti cāpy ukto dehe 'smin puruṣaḥ paraḥ ||22||
GE07bhg4c13u:1230: śrīdharaḥ : tad anena prakāreṇa prakṛty-avivekād eva puruṣasya saṃsāraḥ |
GE07bhg4c13u:1232: ity āśayena tasya svarūpam āha upadraṣṭeti |
GE07bhg4c13u:1234: prakṛti-kārye dehe vartamāno 'pi puruṣaḥ paro bhinna eva |
GE07bhg4c13u:1237: tatra hetavaḥ yasmād upadraṣṭā pṛthag-bhūta eva samīpe sthitvā draṣṭā sākṣīty arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c13u:1242: tathā aiśvaryeṇa rūpeṇa bhartā vidhāyaka iti coktaḥ |
GE07bhg4c13u:1244: mahāṃś cāsau īśvaraś ca sa brahmādīnām api patir iti ca paramātmā vāntaryāmīti coktaḥ śrutyā
GE07bhg4c13u:1245: tathā ca śrutiḥ eṣa sarveśvara evsa bhūtādhipatir loka-pālaḥ ity ādi ||22||
GE07bhg4c13u:1246: madhusūdanaḥ : tad evaṃ prakṛti-mithyā-tādātmyāt puruṣasya saṃsāro na
GE07bhg4c13u:1248: kīdṛśaṃ punas tasya svarūpaṃ yatra na sambhavati saṃsāraḥ ? ity ākāṅkṣāyāṃ tasya svarūpaṃ sākṣān nirdiśann āha upadraṣṭeti |
GE07bhg4c13u:1249: asmin prakṛti-pariṇāme dehe jīva-rūpeṇa vartamāno 'pi puruṣaḥ paraḥ prakṛti-guṇāsaṃsṛṣṭaḥ paramārthato 'saṃsārī svena rūpeṇety artahḥ |
GE07bhg4c13u:1250: yata upadraṣṭā yatha ṛtvig-yajamāneṣu yajña-karma-vyāpṛteṣu tat-samīpastho
GE07bhg4c13u:1253: svayam avyāpṛto vilakṣaṇas teṣāṃ kārya-karaṇānāṃ sa-vyāparāṇāṃ samīpastho draṣṭā na tu kartā puruṣaḥ |
GE07bhg4c13u:1254: sa yat tatra kiṃcit paśyaty ananvāg atas tena bhavaty asaṅgo hy ayaṃ puruṣaḥ [BAU 4.3.15] iti śruteḥ |
GE07bhg4c13u:1255: athavā, deha-cakṣur-mano-buddhy-ātmāno draṣṭṛṣu madhye bāhyān dehādīn apekṣyātyavyavahito draṣṭātmā puruṣa upadraṣṭā |
GE07bhg4c13u:1257: sāmīpyārthatvāt tasya cāvyavadhāna-rūpasya pratyag-ātmany eva paryavasānāt |
GE07bhg4c13u:1258: anumantā ca kārya-karaṇa-pravṛttiṣu svayam apravṛtto 'pi pravṛtta iva saṃnidhi-mātreṇa tad-anukūlatvād anumantā |
GE07bhg4c13u:1260: pravṛttān dehendriyādīn na nivārayati kadācid api tat-sākṣi-bhūtaḥ puruṣa ity anumantā |
GE07bhg4c13u:1263: sva-sattayā sphuraṇena ca dhārayitā poṣayitā ca |
GE07bhg4c13u:1264: bhoktā buddheḥ sukha-duḥkha-mohātmakān pratyayān svarūpa-caitanyena prakāśayatīti nirvikāra evopalabdhā |
GE07bhg4c13u:1265: maheśvaraḥ sarvātmatvāt svatantratvāc ca mahān īśvaraś ceti maheśvaraḥ |
GE07bhg4c13u:1266: paramātmā dehādi-buddhy-antānāṃ avidyayātmatvena kalpitānām paramaḥ prakṛṣṭa upadraṣṭṛtvādi-pūrvokta-viśeṣaṇa-viśiṣṭa ātmā paramātmā |
GE07bhg4c13u:1267: ity anena śabdenāpi uktaḥ kathitaḥ śrutau |
GE07bhg4c13u:1269: upadraṣṭety-ādi-śabdair api sa eva puruṣaḥ paraḥ |
GE07bhg4c13u:1270: uttamaḥ puruṣas tv anyaḥ paramātmety udāhṛtaḥ [Gītā 15.17] ity agre vakṣyate ||22||
GE07bhg4c13u:1271: viśvanāthaḥ : jīvātmānam uktvā paramātmānam āha upadraṣṭeti |
GE07bhg4c13u:1272: yadyapi anādi mat-paraṃ brahma ity ādinā hṛdi sarvasya viṣṭhitam ity anena ca
GE07bhg4c13u:1273: sāmānyataḥ paśeṣataś ca paramātmā prokta eva, tad api tasya
GE07bhg4c13u:1274: jīvātma-sāhityenāpi pṛthag eva spaṣṭatayā dehasthatva-jñāpanārtham iyam uktir jñeyā |
GE07bhg4c13u:1275: asmin dehe paro 'nyaḥ puruṣo yo maheśvarḥ sa paramātmeti cāpy uktaḥ |
GE07bhg4c13u:1276: paramātmeti ca nāmnāpy ukto bhavatīty arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c13u:1278: parama-śabda ekātmavāda-pakṣe svāṃśa iti dyotanārtho jīvasya upa samīpe
GE07bhg4c13u:1285: baladevaḥ : dehe sukhādibhokṭrayāvasthitaṃ jīvam uktvā niyantṛtayā tatrāvasthitam īśvaram āha upadraṣṭeti |
GE07bhg4c13u:1286: asmin dehe paro jīvād anyaḥ puruṣo 'sti yo maheśvaraḥ paramātmeti proktaḥ |
GE07bhg4c13u:1288: anumantānumati-dātā tad-anumatiṃ vinā jīvaḥ kiñcid api kartuṃ na kṣama ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c13u:1291: sarvataḥ pāṇi ity ādibhir uktasyāpīśasya jīvena saha sthitiṃ vaktuṃ punar uktiḥ ||22||
GE07bhg4c13u:1293: ya evaṃ vetti puruṣaṃ prakṛtiṃ ca guṇaiḥ saha |
GE07bhg4c13u:1295: śrīdharaḥ : evaṃ prakṛti-puruṣa-viveka-jñāninaṃ stauti ya evam iti |
GE07bhg4c13u:1297: upadraṣṭṛtvādi-rūpeṇa puruṣaṃ yo vetti prakṛtiṃ ca guṇaiḥ saha
GE07bhg4c13u:1298: sukha-duḥkhādi-pariṇāmaiḥ sahitāṃ yo vetti sa puruṣaḥ sarvathā vidhim atilaṅghyeha vartamāno 'pi punar nābhijāyate |
GE07bhg4c13u:1300: madhusūdanaḥ : tad evaṃ sa ca yo yat prabhāvaś ca [Gītā 13.4] iti vyākhyātam idānīṃ yaj jñātvāmṛtam aśnute ity uktam upasaṃharati ya evam iti |
GE07bhg4c13u:1301: ya evam uktena prakāreṇa vetti puruṣam ayam aham asmīti sākṣātkaroti prakṛtiṃ cāvidyāṃ guṇaiḥ sva-vikāraiḥ saha mithyā-bhūtām ātma-vidyayā
GE07bhg4c13u:1302_0: bādhitāṃ vetti nivṛtte mamājñāna-tāt-kārye iti, sa sarvathā prārabdha-karma-vaśād
GE07bhg4c13u:1302_1: indravad vidhim atikramya vartamāno 'pi bhūyo na jāyate patite 'smin vidvac-charīre
GE07bhg4c13u:1306: api-śabdād vidhim anatikramya vartamānaḥ sva-vṛttastho bhūyo na jāyata iti kim u vaktavyam ity abhiprāyaḥ ||23||
GE07bhg4c13u:1314: evaṃ mad-ukta-vidhayā mitho viviktatayā yaḥ puruṣaṃ maheśvara-prakṛtiṃ ca jīvaṃ ca vetti !
GE07bhg4c13u:1315: vyavahāra-samparkeṇa vartamāno 'pi bhūyo nābhijāyate dehānte vimucyata ity arthaḥ ||23||
GE07bhg4c13u:1317: dhyānenātmani paśyanti ke cid ātmānam ātmanā |
GE07bhg4c13u:1321: ātmani deha eva ātmanā manasā evam ātmānaṃ kecit paśyanti |
GE07bhg4c13u:1328: madhusūdanaḥ : atrātma-darśane sādhana-vikalpā ime kathyante dhyāneneti |
GE07bhg4c13u:1329: iha hi caturvidhā janāḥ, kecid uttamāḥ kecin madhyamāḥ kecin mandāḥ kecin mandatarā iti |
GE07bhg4c13u:1334: buddhau paśyanti sākṣātkurvanti ātmānaṃ pratyak-cetanam ātmanā
GE07bhg4c13u:1336: madhyamānām ātma-jñāna-sādhanam āha -- anye madhyamāḥ sāṃkhyena yogena
GE07bhg4c13u:1338: nityānitya-vivekādi-pūrvakeṇeme guṇa-traya-pariṇāmā anātmanaḥ sarve mithyā-bhūtās tat-sākṣi-bhūto nityo vibhur nirvikāraḥ satyaḥ
GE07bhg4c13u:1345: karma-kalāpena cāpare mandāḥ paśyanti ātmānam ātmaniti vartate |
GE07bhg4c13u:1347: viśvanāthaḥ : atra sādhana-vikalpam āha dhyāneti dvābhyām |
GE07bhg4c13u:1349: bhaktyā mām abhijānāti [Gītā 18.55] ity agrimokter ātmani mansy ātmanā svayam eva na tv anyena kenāpy upakārekeṇety arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c13u:1351: apare yogino yogenāṣṭāṅgena karma-yogena niṣkāma-karmaṇā ca |
GE07bhg4c13u:1353: sāṅkhyāṣṭāṅga-yoga-niṣkāma-karma-yogāḥ paramātma-darśane parasparayaiva hetavo na tu sākṣād dhetavas teṣāṃ sāttvikatvāt paramātmanas tu guṇātītatvāt |
GE07bhg4c13u:1354: kiṃ ca jñānaṃ ca mayi sannyaset [BhP 11.19.1] iti
GE07bhg4c13u:1355: bhagavad-ukter jñānādi-sannyāsānantaram eva bhaktyāham ekayā grāhyaḥ [BhP
GE07bhg4c13u:1356: 11.14.11] ity ukter jñānaṃ vimucya tayā bhaktyaiva paśyanti ||24||
GE07bhg4c13u:1357: baladevaḥ : maheśvarasya prāptau sādhana-vikalpān āha dhyāneneti dvābhyām
GE07bhg4c13u:1358: | kecid viśuddha-cittā ātmani manasi sthitam ātmānaṃ maheśvaraṃ māṃ
GE07bhg4c13u:1359: dhyānenopasarjanī-bhūta-jñānena paśyanti sākṣāt kurvanty ātmanā svayam eva, na tv anyenopakārakeṇa
GE07bhg4c13u:1365: anye tv evam ajānantaḥ śrutvānyebhya upāsate |
GE07bhg4c13u:1367: śrīdharaḥ : ati-mandādhikāriṇāṃ nistāropāyam āha anya iti |
GE07bhg4c13u:1368: anye tu sāṅkhya-yogādi-mārgeṇa evambhūtam upadraṣṭṛtvādi-lakṣaṇam ātmānam sākṣātkartum ajānanto 'nyebhya ācāryebhya upadeśataḥ śrutvā upāsante dhyāyanti |
GE07bhg4c13u:1369: te 'pi ca śraddhayopadeśa-śravaṇa-parāyaṇāḥ santo mṛtyuṃ saṃsāraṃ śanair atitaranty eva
GE07bhg4c13u:1370: madhusūdanaḥ : mandatarāṇāṃ jñāna-sādhanam āha anya iti |
GE07bhg4c13u:1374: eṣūpāyeṣv anyatareṇāpy evaṃ yathoktam ātmānam ajānanto 'nyebhyaḥ kāruṇikebhya ācāryebhyaḥ śrutvā “idam eva cintayata” ity uktā upāsate śraddadhānāḥ santaś cintayanti |
GE07bhg4c13u:1375: te 'pi cātitaranty eva mṛtyum saṃsāram śruti-parāyaṇāḥ
GE07bhg4c13u:1379: vicāra-samarthās te mṛtyum atitarantīti kim u vaktavyam ity abhiprāyaḥ ||25||
GE07bhg4c13u:1381: baladevaḥ : anye tv evam īdṛśānupāyān ajānantaḥ śruti-parāyaṇās
GE07bhg4c13u:1382: tat-tat-kathā-śravaṇādi-niṣṭhāḥ sāmpratikā anyebhyas tad-vaktṛbhyas tān upāyān śrutvā taṃ maheśvaram upāsate |
GE07bhg4c13u:1383: te 'pi cāt ta-saṅginaś ca krameṇa tān upalabhyānuṣṭhāya ca mṛtyum atitaranty eveti
GE07bhg4c13u:1389: dhyāna-yogasya ca ṣaṣṭhāṣṭhamayoḥ prapañcitatvād dhyānādeś ca sāṅkhya-viviktātma-viṣayatvāt sāṅkhyam eva prapañcayann āha yāvad ity ādi yāvad adhyāyāntam |
GE07bhg4c13u:1390: yāvat kiñcit vastu-mātraṃ sattvam utpadyate tat sarvaṃ
GE07bhg4c13u:1392: madhusūdanaḥ : saṃsārasyāvidyakatvād vidyayā mokṣa upapadyata ity etasyārthasyāvadhāraṇāya saṃsāra-tan-nivartaka-jñānayoḥ prapañcaḥ kriyate yāvad adhyāya-samāpti |
GE07bhg4c13u:1394: sad-asad-yoni-janmasv [Gītā 13.21] ity etat prāg uktaṃ vivṛṇoti yāvad iti
GE07bhg4c13u:1395_0: | yāvat kim api sattvaṃ vastu saṃjāyate sthāvaraṃ jaṅgamaṃ vā tat sarvaṃ kṣetra-kṣetrajña-saṃyogād
GE07bhg4c13u:1395_1: avidyā-tat-kāryātmakaṃ jaḍam anirvacanīyaṃ sad-asattvaṃ dṛśya-jātaṃ kṣetraṃ tad-vilakṣaṇaṃ
GE07bhg4c13u:1399: tasmād eva saṃjāyate tat sarvaṃ kārya-jātam iti viddhi he bharatarṣabha |
GE07bhg4c13u:1401: svarūpājñāna-nibandhanaḥ saṃsāraḥ svarūpa-jñānād vinaṃṣṭum arhati svapnādivad ity abhiprāyaḥ
GE07bhg4c13u:1402: viśvanāthaḥ : uktam evārthaṃ prapañcayati yāvad adhyāya-samāpti |
GE07bhg4c13u:1403: yāvad iti yat-pramāṇakaṃ nikṛṣṭam utkṛṣṭaṃ vā |
GE07bhg4c13u:1405: baladevaḥ : athānādi-saṃyuktayoḥ prakṛti-jīvayor yogānusandhānāya tayoḥ saṃyogena sṛṣṭiṃ tāvad āha yāvad iti |
GE07bhg4c13u:1406: sthāvara-jaṅgamaṃ kiñcit sattvaṃ prāṇi-jātaṃ yāvad yat-pramāṇakam utkṛṣṭam apakṛṣṭaṃ ca sañjāyate tat kṣetra-kṣetrajña-saṃyogād viddhi |
GE07bhg4c13u:1407: kṣetreṇa prakṛtyā saha kṣetrajñayoḥ sambandhāj jānīhīty arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c13u:1413: vinaśyatsv avinaśyantaṃ yaḥ paśyati sa paśyati ||27||
GE07bhg4c13u:1417: bhūteṣu nirviśeṣaṃ sad-rūpeṇa samaṃ yathā bhavaty evaṃ tiṣṭhantaṃ paramātmānaṃ yaḥ paśyati ataeva teṣu vinaśyatsv api avinaśyantaṃ yaḥ
GE07bhg4c13u:1419: madhusūdanaḥ : evaṃ saṃsāram avidyātmakam uktvā tan nivartaka-vidyā-kathanāya ya evaṃ vetti puruṣam iti prāg uktaṃ vivṛṇoti samam iti |
GE07bhg4c13u:1421: prāṇiṣu aneka-vidha-janmādi-pariṇāma-śīlatayā guṇa-pradhāna-bhāvāpattyā ca viṣameṣu ataeva cañcaleṣu pratikṣaṇa-pariṇāmino hi bhāvā nāpariṇamya
GE07bhg4c13u:1425: samaṃ sarvatraika-rūpaṃ pratideham ekaṃ janmādi-pariṇāma-śūnyatayā ca tiṣṭhantam apariṇamamānaṃ
GE07bhg4c13u:1429: evaṃ sarva-prakāreṇa jaḍa-prapañca-vilakṣaṇam ātmānaṃ vivekena yaḥ śāstra-cakṣuṣā paśyati sa eva paśyaty ātmānaṃ jāgrad-bodhena
GE07bhg4c13u:1431: ajñas tu svapna-darśīva bhrāntyā viparītaṃ paśyan na paśyaty eva |
GE07bhg4c13u:1433: na hi rajjuṃ sarpatayā paśyan paśyatīti vyapadiśyate |
GE07bhg4c13u:1443: arthāt prāptam anyat kaṇṭhoktam iti vivekaḥ ||27||
GE07bhg4c13u:1444: viśvanāthaḥ : paramātmānaṃ tv evaṃ jānīyād ity āha samam iti |
GE07bhg4c13u:1445: vinaśyatsv api deheṣu yaḥ paśyati, sa eva jñānīty arthaḥ ||27||
GE07bhg4c13u:1446: baladevaḥ : atha prakṛtau tat-saṃyukteṣu ca jīveṣu sthitam apīśvaraṃ tebhyo viviktaṃ paśyed ity āha samam iti |
GE07bhg4c13u:1447: yas tv atattvavit prasaṅgī sarveṣu sthāvara-jaṅgama-dehavatsu bhūteṣu jīveṣu samam ekarasaṃ yathā syāt tathā tiṣṭhantaṃ parameśvaraṃ vinaśyatsu tat-tad-deha-vimardena
GE07bhg4c13u:1448: vināśaṃ gacchatsu teṣv avinaśyantaṃ tad-vaikṣaṇaṃ paśyati sa eva paśyati
GE07bhg4c13u:1451: prakṛti-saṃyogibhyo jīvebhya aikarasyāvināśa-dharmā pareśo vivikta iti
GE07bhg4c13u:1453: samaṃ paśyan hi sarvatra samavasthitam īśvaram |
GE07bhg4c13u:1454: na hinasty ātmanātmānaṃ tato yāti parāṃ gatim ||28||
GE07bhg4c13u:1457: sarvatra bhūtamātre samaṃ samyag apracyuta-svarūpeṇāvasthitaṃ paramātmānaṃ paśyan |
GE07bhg4c13u:1458: hi yasmād ātmanā svenaivātmānaṃ na hinasti |
GE07bhg4c13u:1459: avidyayā sac-cid-ānanda-rūpam ātmānaṃ tiraskṛtya na vināśayati |
GE07bhg4c13u:1460: tataś ca parāṃ gatiṃ mokṣaṃ prāpnoti |
GE07bhg4c13u:1461: yat tv evaṃ na paśyati sa hi dehātma-darśī dehena sahātmānaṃ hinasti |
GE07bhg4c13u:1463: asūryā nāma te lokā andhena tamasāvṛtāḥ |
GE07bhg4c13u:1464: tāṃs te pretyābhigacchanti ye ke cātma-hano janāḥ || [ĪśaU 3] iti ||28|
GE07bhg4c13u:1465: madhusūdanaḥ : tad etad ātma-darśanaṃ phalena stauti rucy-utpattaye samam iti |
GE07bhg4c13u:1470: pūrvokta-viśeṣaṇam ātmānaṃ paśyann ayam aham asmīti śāstra-dṛṣṭyā
GE07bhg4c13u:1473: ekam akartr-abhoktṛ-paramānanda-rūpam ātmānam avidyayā sati bhāty api vastuni nāsti na bhātīti pratīti-janana-samarthayā svayam eva tiraskurvann
GE07bhg4c13u:1474: asantam iva karotīti hinasty eva tam |
GE07bhg4c13u:1475: tathāvidyayātmatvena paritgṛhītaṃ dehendriya-saṃghātam ātmānaṃ purātanaṃ hatvā navam ādatte karma-vaśād iti hinasty eva tam |
GE07bhg4c13u:1478: kiṃ tena na kṛtaṃ pāpaṃ coreṇātmāpahāriṇā |
GE07bhg4c13u:1479: yo 'nyathā santam ātmānam anyathā pratipadyate || iti |
GE07bhg4c13u:1481: asūryā nāma te lokā andhena tamasāvṛtāḥ |
GE07bhg4c13u:1482: tāṃs te pretyābhigacchanti ye ke cātma-hano janāḥ || [ĪśaU 3] iti asūryā asurasya sva-bhūtā āsuryā saṃpadā bhogyā ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c13u:1483: ātma-hana ity anātmany ātmābhimānina ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c13u:1486: ataḥ svarūpa-lābhāc ca hinasty ātmanātmānaṃ tato yāti parāṃ gatim |
GE07bhg4c13u:1489: viśvanāthaḥ : ātmanā manasā kupatha-gāminā ātmānaṃ jīvaṃ na hinasti
GE07bhg4c13u:1491: baladevaḥ : athokta-viṣayā tebhyo viviktam īśvaraṃ paśyan
GE07bhg4c13u:1492: tad-darśana-mahimnā ca prakṛti-vikārebhyaḥ sva-vivekaṃ ca labhata ity
GE07bhg4c13u:1494: sarvatra bhūteṣu samaṃ yathā bhavaty evaṃ
GE07bhg4c13u:1495_0: samyag-apracyuta-svarūpa-guṇatayāvasthitam īśvaraṃ paśyann ātmānaṃ svam ātmanā prakṛti-vikāra-viveka-grāhiṇā
GE07bhg4c13u:1495_1: viṣaya-rasa-gṛdhnunā manasā na hinasti nādhaḥpātayati, sa tad-rasa-viraktena tena
GE07bhg4c13u:1499: yaḥ paśyati tathātmānam akartāraṃ sa paśyati ||29||
GE07bhg4c13u:1500: śrīdharaḥ : nanu śubhāśubha-karma-kartṛtvena vaiṣamye dṛśyamāne katham
GE07bhg4c13u:1505: tathātmānaṃ cākartāraṃ dehābhimānenaiva ātmanaḥ kartṛtvaṃ na svataḥ |
GE07bhg4c13u:1506: ity evaṃ yaḥ paśyati sa eva samyak paśyati |
GE07bhg4c13u:1508: madhusūdanaḥ : nanu śubhāśubha-karma-kartāraḥ pratidehaṃ bhinnā ātmano
GE07bhg4c13u:1510: ekam ātmānaṃ samaṃ paśyan na hinasty ātmanātmānam ity uktam ata āha prakṛtyaiveti |
GE07bhg4c13u:1513: triguṇātmikayā bhagavan-māyayaiva kriyamāṇāni na tu puruṣeṇa
GE07bhg4c13u:1514_0: sarva-vikāra-śūnyena yo vivekī paśyati, evaṃ kṣetreṇa kriyamāṇeṣv api karmasu ātmānaṃ
GE07bhg4c13u:1514_1: kṣetrajñam akartāraṃ sarvopādhi-vivarjitam asaṅgam ekaṃ sarvatra samaṃ yaḥ paśyati,
GE07bhg4c13u:1514_2: tathā-śabdaḥ paśyatīti-kriyā-karṣaṇārthaḥ, sa paśyati sa paramārtha-darśīti pūrvavat |
GE07bhg4c13u:1516: tat-tad-vicitra-karma-kartṛtvena prati-dehaṃ bhede 'pi vaiṣamye 'pi na nirviśeṣasyākartur ākāśasyeva na bhede pramāṇaṃ kiṃcid ātmana ity
GE07bhg4c13u:1518: viśvanāthaḥ : prakṛtyaiva dehendriyādyākāreṇa pariṇatayā sarvaśaḥ sarvāṇy ātmānaṃ jīvaṃ dehābhimānenaiva ātmanaḥ kartṛtvam, na tu svataḥ |
GE07bhg4c13u:1520: baladevaḥ : prakṛteḥ sva-vivekaṃ kathaṃ yātīty apekṣāyāṃ tatra prakāram āha - prakṛtyaiveti dvābhyām |
GE07bhg4c13u:1521_0: yaḥ sarvāṇi karmāṇi prakṛtyaiva cān mad-adhiṣṭhitayeśvara-preritayā kriyamāṇāni paśyati,
GE07bhg4c13u:1521_1: tathātmānaṃ teṣāṃ karmaṇām akartāraṃ paśyati, sa eva paśyati sva-yāthāṭmya-darśī
GE07bhg4c13u:1521_2: bhavati ayam arthaḥ na khalu vijñānānanda-svabhāvo 'haṃ yuddha-yajñādīni
GE07bhg4c13u:1522_0: duḥkha-mayāni karmāṇi karomi, kintv anādibhogavāsanenāvivekinā mayādhiṣṭhitā mad-bhoga-siddhaye
GE07bhg4c13u:1522_1: mad-dehādi-dvārā tāni karotīti tad-dhetukatvāt saiva tat-kartṛīti karam-kāriṇyāḥ
GE07bhg4c13u:1524: śuddhasyāpi kartṛtvaṃ tu paśyatīty anena vyaktam iti ||
GE07bhg4c13u:1527: tata eva ca vistāraṃ brahma saṃpadyate tadā ||30||
GE07bhg4c13u:1528: śrīdharaḥ : idānīṃ tu bhūtānām api prakṛtis tāvan-mātratvenābhedād
GE07bhg4c13u:1529: bhūta-bheda-kṛtam apy ātmano bhedam apaśyan brahmatvam upaitīty āha yadeti |
GE07bhg4c13u:1530: yadā bhūtānāṃ sthāvara-jaṅgamānāṃ pṛthag-bhāvaṃ bhedaṃ pṛthaktvam ekastham ekasyām eveśra-śakti-rūpāyāṃ prakṛtau pralaye sthitam anupaśyati ālocayati |
GE07bhg4c13u:1531: ataeva tasyā eva prakṛteḥ sakāśād bhūtānāṃ vistāraṃ
GE07bhg4c13u:1533: tadā prakṛti-tāvan-mātratvena bhūtānām apy abhedaṃ paśyan paripūrṇaṃ brahma sampadyate
GE07bhg4c13u:1535: madhusūdanaḥ : tad evam āpātataḥ kṣetra-bheda-darśanam anabhyanujñāya
GE07bhg4c13u:1536: kṣetra-bheda-darśanam apākṛtam idānīṃ tu kṣetra-bheda-darśanam api māyikatvenāpākaroti yadeti
GE07bhg4c13u:1538: sarveṣām api jaḍa-vargāṇāṃ pṛthag-bhāvaṃ pṛthaktvam paraspara-bhinnatvam
GE07bhg4c13u:1539: eka-stham ekasminn evātmani sad-rūpe sthitaṃ kalpitaṃ kalpitasyādhiṣṭhānād
GE07bhg4c13u:1541: anu svayam ālocayati ātmaivedaṃ sarvam [ChāU 7.25.2] iti |
GE07bhg4c13u:1542: evam api māyāv-vaśāt tata ekasmād ātmana eva vistāraṃ bhūtānāṃ pṛthag-bhāvaṃ ca
GE07bhg4c13u:1544: sajātīya-vijātīya-bheda-darśanābhāvād brahmaiva sarvānartha-śūnyaṃ bhavati tasmin kāle |
GE07bhg4c13u:1546: tatra ko mohaḥ kaḥ śoka ekatvam anupaśyataḥ || [ĪśaU 7] iti śruteḥ |
GE07bhg4c13u:1548: yadā bhūta-pṛthag-bhāvam ity atra tv anātma-bhedo 'pīti viśeṣaḥ ||30||
GE07bhg4c13u:1550: tat-tad-ākāra-gataṃ pārthakyam ekastham ekasyāṃ prakṛtāv eva sthitaṃ
GE07bhg4c13u:1552: tataḥ prakṛteḥ sakāśād eva bhūtānāṃ vistāraṃ sṛṣṭi-samaye 'nupaśyati tadā brahma sampadyate brahmaiva bhavatīty arthaḥ ||30||
GE07bhg4c13u:1557: prakṛti-gatam eva pralaye 'nupaśyati tataḥ prakṛtita eva sarge teṣāṃ devatvādīnāṃ vistāraṃ ca paśyati, na tv ātmasthaṃ tat pṛthag-bhāvaṃ na cāṭmanas tad-vistāraṃ ca paśyati |
GE07bhg4c13u:1563: śarīra-stho 'pi kaunteya na karoti na lipyate ||31||
GE07bhg4c13u:1568: yad utpattimat tad eva hi vyeti vināśam eti |
GE07bhg4c13u:1569: yac ca guṇavad vastu tasya hi guṇa-nāśe vyayo bhavati |
GE07bhg4c13u:1570: ayaṃ tu paramātmā anādi nirguṇaś ca |
GE07bhg4c13u:1573: tasmāt śarīre sthito 'pi na kiñcit karoti |
GE07bhg4c13u:1576: kartṛtvaṃ syād ity āśaṅkām apanudan yaḥ paśyati tathātmānam akartāraṃ sa paśyatīty etad vivṛṇoti anādirvād iti |
GE07bhg4c13u:1577: ayam aparokṣaḥ paramātmā parameśvarābhinnaḥ pratyag-ātmāvyayo na vyetīty avyayaḥ sarva-vikāra-śūnya
GE07bhg4c13u:1583: sā ca nāsti sarvadā sata ātmanaḥ |
GE07bhg4c13u:1586: tad-abhāve ca tad-uttara-bhāvino bhāva-vikārā na sambhavanty eva |
GE07bhg4c13u:1590: na hi dharmiṇam avikṛtya kaścid dharma upaity apaiti vā dharma-dharmiṇos
GE07bhg4c13u:1591: tādātmyād ayaṃ tu nirdharmako 'to na dharma-dvārāpi vyetīty arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c13u:1592: avināśī vā are 'yam ātmānucchitti-dharmā [BAU 4.5.14] iti śruteḥ |
GE07bhg4c13u:1593: yasmād eṣa jāyate 'sti vardhate vipariṇamate 'pakṣīyate vinaśyatīty evaṃ ṣaḍ-bhāva-vikāra-śūnya ādhyāsikena sambandhena śarīra-stho 'pi tasmin kurvaty ayam ātmā na karoti |
GE07bhg4c13u:1595: savitā tasmiṃś calaty api na calaty eva tadvat |
GE07bhg4c13u:1596: yato na lipyate na tv ayam akartṛtvād ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c13u:1597: icchā dveṣaḥ sukhaṃ duḥkham ity ādīnāṃ
GE07bhg4c13u:1605: prakṛtyaiva ca karmāṇi [Gītā 13.29] ity atra sajātīya-bhedo nivāritaḥ |
GE07bhg4c13u:1608: anāditvān nirguṇatvād [Gītā 13.31] ity atra svagato bheda ity advitīyaṃ
GE07bhg4c13u:1610: viśvanāthaḥ : nanu kāraṇaṃ guṇa-saṅgo 'sya sad-asad-yoni-janmasu ity uktam |
GE07bhg4c13u:1611: tatra deha-gatatvena tulyatve 'pi jīvātmaiva guṇa-liptaḥ saṃsarati na tu
GE07bhg4c13u:1613: kuta ity ata āha anāditvād iti |
GE07bhg4c13u:1614: na vidyate ādiḥ kāraṇaṃ yataḥ sa anādiḥ |
GE07bhg4c13u:1615: yathā pañcamy-anta-padārthenānuttama-śabdena paramottama ucyate tathaiva anādi-śabdena parama-kāraṇam ucyate |
GE07bhg4c13u:1616: tataś cānāditvāt parama-kāraṇatvāt nirguṇatvān nirgatā guṇaḥ sṛṣṭyādayo yatas tasya bhāvas tattvaṃ tasmāc ca jīvātmano vilakṣaṇo 'yaṃ paramātmā |
GE07bhg4c13u:1619: tad-dharmāgrahaṇāt na karoti jīvavat na kartā, na bhoktā bhavati, na ca lipyate śarīra-guṇa-liptaś ca na bhavati ||31||
GE07bhg4c13u:1620_0: baladevaḥ : nanu pareśam ātmānaṃ ca viviktaṃ paśyati kṛtārtho bhavatīty uktir ayuktā
GE07bhg4c13u:1620_1: etebhya eva bhūtebhyaḥ samutthāya tāny evānu vinaśyati na prety asaṃjñāsti iti jīvasya
GE07bhg4c13u:1620_2: dehena sahotpatti-vināśa-śravaṇād iti cet tatrāha anāditvād iti |
GE07bhg4c13u:1631: śrīdharaḥ : tatra hetuṃ sa-dṛṣṭāntam āha yatheti |
GE07bhg4c13u:1633: paṅkādiṣv api sthitam ākāśaṃ saukṣmyād asaṅgatvāt paṅkādibhir nopalipyate tathā sarvatra uttame madhyame adhame vā dehe 'vasthito 'pi ātmā nopalipyate ||32||
GE07bhg4c13u:1634: madhusūdanaḥ : śarīra-stho 'pi tat-karmaṇā na lipyate svayam asaṅgatvād ity atra dṛṣṭāntam āha yatheti |
GE07bhg4c13u:1636: sarva-gatam api nopalipyate paṅkādibhir yatheti dṛṣṭāntārthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c13u:1638: viśvanāthaḥ : atha dṛṣṭāntam āha yathā sarvatra paṅkādiṣv api sthitam apy
GE07bhg4c13u:1639: ākāśaṃ saukṣmyād asaṅgatvāt paṅkādibhir na lipyate, tathaiva paramātmā daihikair guṇair doṣaiś ca na yujyata ity arthaḥ ||32||
GE07bhg4c13u:1640: baladevaḥ : nanu śarīre sthitas tad-dharmaiḥ kuto na lipyate ity atrāha yatheti |
GE07bhg4c13u:1641: yathā sarvatra paṅkādau gataṃ praviṣṭam apy ākāśaṃ saukṣmyāt tat-tad-dharmair na lipyate, tathātmā jīvaḥ sarvatra deva-mānavādāv
GE07bhg4c13u:1642: uccāvace dehe sthito 'pi tad-dharmair na lipyate saukṣmyād eva ||32||
GE07bhg4c13u:1644: yathā prakāśayaty ekaḥ kṛtsnaṃ lokam imaṃ raviḥ |
GE07bhg4c13u:1645: kṣetraṃ kṣetrī tathā kṛtsnaṃ prakāśayati bhārata ||33||
GE07bhg4c13u:1646: śrīdharaḥ : asaṅgatvāl lepo nāstīty ākāśa-dṛṣṭāntena darśitam |
GE07bhg4c13u:1647: prakāśakatvāc ca prakāśya-dharmair na yujyata iti ravi-dṛṣṭāntenāha yathā prakāśayatīti |
GE07bhg4c13u:1649: madhusūdanaḥ : na kevalam asaṅga-svabhāvād ātmā nopalipyate prakāśakatvād
GE07bhg4c13u:1650: api parkāśya-dharmair na lipyate iti sa-dṛṣṭāntam āha yatheti |
GE07bhg4c13u:1651: yathā ravir eka eva kṛtsnaṃ sarvam imaṃ lokaṃ dehendriya-saṃghātaṃ rūpavad
GE07bhg4c13u:1652: vastu-mātram iti yāvat prakāśayati na ca prakāśya-dharmair lipyate na vā
GE07bhg4c13u:1653: prakāśya-bhedād bhidyate tathā kṣetrī kṣetrajña eka eva kṛtsnaṃ kṣetraṃ prakāśayati |
GE07bhg4c13u:1654: he bhārata ! ataeva na prakāśya-dharmair lipyate na vā
GE07bhg4c13u:1656: sūryo yathā sarva-lokasya cakṣuḥ na lipyate cākṣuṣair bāhya-doṣaiḥ |
GE07bhg4c13u:1658: na lipyate loka-duḥkhena bāhyaḥ || iti [KaṭhU 2.2.11] śruteḥ ||
GE07bhg4c13u:1659: viśvanāthaḥ : prakāśakatvāt prakāśya-dharmair na yujyata iti sa-dṛṣṭāntam
GE07bhg4c13u:1661: ravir yathā prakāśakaḥ prakāśya-dharmair na yujyate, tathā kṣetrī paramātmā |
GE07bhg4c13u:1662: sūryo yathā sarva-lokasya cakṣur na lipyate cākṣuṣair bāhya-doṣaiḥ |
GE07bhg4c13u:1664: na lipyate śoka-duḥkhena bāhyaḥ || iti [KaṭhU 2.2.11] śruteḥ ||
GE07bhg4c13u:1665: baladevaḥ : deha-dharmeṇālipta evātmā sva-dharmeṇa dehaṃ puṣṇātīty āha
GE07bhg4c13u:1667_0: yathaiko ravir imaṃ kṛtsnaṃ lokaṃ prakāśayati prabhayā tathaikaḥ kṣetrī jīvaḥ kṛtsnam
GE07bhg4c13u:1667_1: āpāda-mastakam idaṃ kṣetraṃ dehaṃ prakāśayati cetayati cetanayety evam āha guṇād
GE07bhg4c13u:1669: bhūta-prakṛti-mokṣaṃ ca ye vidur yānti te param ||34||
GE07bhg4c13u:1673: cakṣuṣā ye viduḥ tathā xexam uktā bhūtānāṃ prakṛtis tasyāḥ sakāśān mokṣaṃ mokṣopāyaṃ dhyānādikaṃ ca ye viduḥ te paraṃ padaṃ yānti ||34||
GE07bhg4c13u:1678: madhusūdanaḥ : idānīm adhyāyārthaṃ saphalam upasaṃharati kṣetreti |
GE07bhg4c13u:1682: bhūta-prakṛti-mokṣaṃ ca bhūtānāṃ sarveṣāṃ prakṛtir avidyā māyākhyā tasyāḥ
GE07bhg4c13u:1683: paramārthātma-vidyayā mokṣam abhāva-gamanaṃ ca ye vidur jānanti yānti te
GE07bhg4c13u:1684: paraṃ paramārthātma-vastu-svarūpaṃ kaivalyaṃ, na punar dehaṃ ādadata ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c13u:1691: viśvanāthaḥ : adhyāyam upasaṃharati kṣetreṇa saha kṣetrajñayor jīvātma-paramātmanor antaraṃ bhedaṃ tathā bhūtānāṃ prāṇināṃ prakṛteḥ
GE07bhg4c13u:1692: sakāśān mokṣaṃ mokṣopāyaṃ dhyānādikaṃ ca ye vidus te paraṃ padaṃ yānti ||34||
GE07bhg4c13u:1694: badhyate mucyate jñānād ity adhyāyārtha īritaḥ ||
GE07bhg4c13u:1697: baladevaḥ : adhyāyārtham upasaṃharan taj-jñāna-phalam āha kṣetreti |
GE07bhg4c13u:1698: kṣetreṇa sahitayoḥ kṣetrajñayor jīveśayor evaṃ mad-ukti-vidhayāntaraṃ
GE07bhg4c13u:1699_0: bhedaṃ jñāna-cakṣuṣā vaidharmya-viṣayaka-prajñā-netreṇa ye vidus tathābhūtānāṃ prakṛteḥ
GE07bhg4c13u:1699_1: sakāśān mokṣaṃ ca tat-sādhanam amānitvādikaṃ ye vidus te prakṛteḥ paraṃ sarvotkṛṣṭaṃ
GE07bhg4c13u:1701: badhyate mucyate bodhād iti jñānaṃ trayodaśāt ||
